sections.title: Indian Sign Language and Training Center
sections.description: Indian Sign Language and Research Center (ISLRTC) is an autonomous organization under the Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities (Divyangjan) under ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment, Government of India, New Delhi.

sections.title: Indian Sign Language Application
sections.description: Indian Sign Language Application provides access to Indian Sign Language (ISL) Dictionary. The 10,000 ISL terms and its explanation in ISL can be accessed through Hindi and English Languages. The ISL app is useful for both Deaf and Hearing individuals including parents, teachers, and interpreters, professionals working in the field.
